languages.text: "Когда случилось покушение, я понял, что это — мой шанс показать, чего я стою. Пока ты копалась, я быстро вышел на подозреваемого, запутал следствие — и это было несложно, — а сам искал настоящего Гведона. Если бы я успел его найти — сейчас твое место уже было бы моим, Иокаста".

"When this crime occurred, I realised it was my chance to show what I was worth. While you were busy dallying, I quickly learned the name of the suspect, diverted the course of the investigation — an easy enough task — and began looking for the real Gwedon. Had I found him in time, your position would have already been mine, Jocasta."
languages.original_text: "Когда случилось покушение, я понял, что это — мой шанс показать, чего я стою. Пока ты копалась, я быстро вышел на подозреваемого, запутал следствие — и это было несложно, — а сам искал настоящего Гведона. Если бы я успел его найти — сейчас твое место уже было бы моим, Иокаста".

traits.locale_text: "When this crime occurred, I realised it was my chance to show what I was worth. While you dallied, I quickly learned the name of the suspect, diverted the course of the investigation — an easy enough task — and began looking for the real Gwedon. Had I found him in time, your position would have already been mine, Jocasta."

languages.text: « Quand ce crime a été commis, j'ai tout de suite su que c'était l'occasion ou jamais de faire mes preuves. Pendant que vous perdiez votre temps à lambiner, j'ai rapidement découvert l'identité du suspect, j'ai aisément dévié le cours de l'enquête et je me suis mis à la recherche du vrai Gwedon. Si seulement je l'avais trouvé à temps, c'est moi qui occuperais votre poste à l'heure actuelle, Jocasta. »
languages.original_text: "When this crime occurred, I realised it was my chance to show what I was worth. While you were busy dallying, I quickly learned the name of the suspect, diverted the course of the investigation — an easy enough task — and began looking for the real Gwedon. Had I found him in time, your position would have already been mine, Jocasta."

traits.locale_text: « Quand ce crime a été commis, j'ai tout de suite su que c'était l'occasion ou jamais de faire mes preuves. Pendant que vous perdiez votre temps à lambiner, j'ai rapidement découvert l'identité du suspect, j'ai aisément dévié le cours de l'enquête et je me suis mis à la recherche du vrai Gwedon. Si seulement je l'avais trouvé à temps, c'est moi qui occuperais votre poste à l'heure actuelle, Jocasta. »

languages.text: «Cuando se produjo el crimen, me di cuenta de que era mi oportunidad de demostrar mi valía. Mientras tú remoloneabas, descubrí rápidamente el nombre del sospechoso, alteré el curso de la investigación (cosa bastante sencilla) y empecé a buscar al auténtico Gwedon. De haberlo encontrado a tiempo, tu posición ya sería mía, Jocasta».
languages.original_text: "When this crime occurred, I realised it was my chance to show what I was worth. While you were busy dallying, I quickly learned the name of the suspect, diverted the course of the investigation — an easy enough task — and began looking for the real Gwedon. Had I found him in time, your position would have already been mine, Jocasta."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando se produjo el crimen, me di cuenta de que era mi oportunidad de demostrar mi valía. Mientras tú remoloneabas, descubrí rápidamente el nombre del sospechoso, alteré el curso de la investigación (cosa bastante sencilla) y empecé a buscar al auténtico Gwedon. De haberlo encontrado a tiempo, tu posición ya sería mía, Jocasta».

languages.text: “当这场凶杀案发生的时候，我便意识到：是时候展现我的价值了。当你还在像没头苍蝇乱撞的时候，我已经查清了真正嫌疑人的名字，转移了调查的方向，开始寻找真正的戈登，整件事情都易如反掌。如果我能及时找到这个人的话，你现在的位置已经是我的了，约卡斯塔。”
languages.original_text: "When this crime occurred, I realised it was my chance to show what I was worth. While you were busy dallying, I quickly learned the name of the suspect, diverted the course of the investigation — an easy enough task — and began looking for the real Gwedon. Had I found him in time, your position would have already been mine, Jocasta."

traits.locale_text: “当这场凶杀案发生的时候，我便意识到：是时候展现我的价值了。当你还在像没头苍蝇乱撞的时候，我已经查清了真正嫌疑人的名字，转移了调查的方向，开始寻找真正的戈登，整件事情都易如反掌。如果我能及时找到这个人的话，你现在的位置已经是我的了，约卡斯塔。”

languages.text: 「この事件が起こった時、私は自分の価値を証明するチャンスだと気づいた。あなたがぼんやりしている間に、容疑者の名前を知り、捜査の流れをそらした。これは簡単なことだったよ…そして、本物のグウェンドンを探し始めた。もう少し早く彼を見つけていれば、ジョカスタ、あなたの地位は今頃、私のものになっていたことでしょう」
languages.original_text: "When this crime occurred, I realised it was my chance to show what I was worth. While you were busy dallying, I quickly learned the name of the suspect, diverted the course of the investigation — an easy enough task — and began looking for the real Gwedon. Had I found him in time, your position would have already been mine, Jocasta."

traits.locale_text: 「この事件が起こった時、私は自分の価値を証明するチャンスだと気づいた。あなたがぼんやりしている間に、容疑者の名前を知り、捜査の流れをそらした。これは簡単なことだったよ…そして、本物のグウェンドンを探し始めた。もう少し早く彼を見つけていれば、ジョカスタ、あなたの地位は今頃、私のものになっていたことでしょう」

languages.text: "Als dieses Verbrechen geschah, erkannte ich meine Chance, meinen Wert zu beweisen. Während Ihr herumgetrödelt habt, habe ich den Namen des Verdächtigen ermittelt, die Untersuchung in eine andere Richtung gelenkt – was ein Kinderspiel war – und begonnen, nach dem wahren Gwedon zu suchen. Hätte ich ihn rechtzeitig gefunden, hätte Euer Posten mir gehört, Jocasta."
languages.original_text: "When this crime occurred, I realised it was my chance to show what I was worth. While you were busy dallying, I quickly learned the name of the suspect, diverted the course of the investigation — an easy enough task — and began looking for the real Gwedon. Had I found him in time, your position would have already been mine, Jocasta."

traits.locale_text: "Als dieses Verbrechen geschah, erkannte ich meine Chance, meinen Wert zu beweisen. Während Ihr herumgetrödelt habt, habe ich den Namen des Verdächtigen ermittelt, die Untersuchung in eine andere Richtung gelenkt – was ein Kinderspiel war – und begonnen, nach dem wahren Gwedon zu suchen. Hätte ich ihn rechtzeitig gefunden, hätte Euer Posten mir gehört, Jocasta."

languages.text: "Bu suç işlendiğinde bana kıymetimi kanıtlama şansı doğduğunu fark ettim. Siz vakit öldürmekle meşgulken ben şüphelinin ismini hemen öğrendim, soruşturmanın gidişatını değiştirdim ki oldukça kolay bir işti. Ardından da gerçek Gwedon'u aramaya başladım. Onu zamanında bulabilseydim mevkin benim olabilirdi Jocasta."
languages.original_text: "When this crime occurred, I realised it was my chance to show what I was worth. While you were busy dallying, I quickly learned the name of the suspect, diverted the course of the investigation — an easy enough task — and began looking for the real Gwedon. Had I found him in time, your position would have already been mine, Jocasta."
